name: Pond Jumper
description:
Pond Jumper is a Single Player First Person Action Puzzle Game where you Launch, Bounce, and Grapple your way to the end of levels

It is made for mouse and keyboard and should take 10 mins to play.

Controls:

  • Move:[WASD]
  • Look:[Mouse]
  • Jump:[Space]
  • Sprint:[Shift]
  • Place Launch Pad: [M1]
  • Place Catch Lily: [M2]
  • Grapple: [E]
